translation.en: BOTH: Come and play with us. Come and play.
translation.zh:
来跟我们玩
来玩吧

translation.en: BOY 1: Not gonna get me! BOY 2: You wish!
REPORTER 1: This morning's quake is causing major problems for commuters.
translation.zh:
今早的地震也给上下班的人
带来了很大不便

translation.en: The 5.7-magnitude quake hit New York early this morning.
translation.zh: 今早纽约发生了五点七级地震

translation.en: Yet another in a series of quakes that has rattled both coasts.
translation.zh:
在最近这一系列地震中
这是又一次影响了东西海岸的地震

translation.en: Tokyo was hit again. And with the Berlin quake last week--
translation.zh:
东京又发生了地震
柏林上周也有

translation.en: REPORTER 2: Question is: What is causing all these earthquakes?
translation.zh: 问题是：是什么引发了这些地震？

translation.en: Christ, even ESPN's doing the quakes now.
translation.zh:
连娱乐与体育节目电视网
都在报道地震

translation.en: REPORTER 3: But we still don't know what's causing them.
translation.zh: 但我们还是不知道是什么引起的

translation.en: Hey. My folks sent me over to see...
-...if you guys are still alive. -We're fine, Timmy.
translation.zh:
-你们是不是还活着
-我们没事，缇米

translation.en: -See you later? LAURIE: Say hi to your mom for me.
Don't forget, you have Dr. Hotchkiss after school.
translation.zh: 别忘了你放学后得见霍奇科斯医生

translation.en: We're wasting money on all those shrinks.
translation.zh: 我们可在这些心理医生上浪费了不少钱

translation.en: BOY: Hey, did you get the books from my locker?
translation.zh: 你是从我柜子里拿的书吗？
那世界末日什么时候来呀？

translation.en: Come on, man, just give me my book.
-What's wrong, your meds stop working? TEACHER: Hey! Hey!
translation.zh:
-怎么了嘛，你吃的药不起作用了？
-嘿！

translation.en: JAKE: Give me my book! -Get off me!
Hey. You need to go home and cool off.
HOTCHKISS: You've been, uh, quite busy, Jake.
This big tower in the clouds you keep dreaming about...
translation.zh:
你一直梦到的这个
高耸入云的巨塔

translation.en: ...you say these earthquakes we've been having have something to do with it.
translation.zh:
你说咱们最近发生的这些地震
跟它有关

translation.en: They happen because the Tower is under attack.
translation.zh:
那些地震之所以发生是因为
这座塔在遭受攻击
你是个聪明的孩子，杰克

translation.en: You know when you can't differentiate...
translation.zh: 你知道，如果你不能区分

translation.en: -...between dreams and reality-- -It's not a dream.
I always see the same thing.
translation.zh: 我总是看到同样的东西

translation.en: The Tower, the Man in Black, the creepy guys with the fake skins.
translation.zh:
那座塔，黑衣人
有假皮肤的怪人

translation.en: What if the Tower were destroyed?
When you lost your father, your world fell apart.
translation.zh:
当你失去你父亲时
你的世界崩溃了

translation.en: You have these visions of impending hell on Earth...
translation.zh: 你看到这些在地球上地狱来临的幻象
是因为这是你内心的感受
即使是像“黑暗”和“火”这种词

translation.en: ...Jake, you're describing the night your father died.
translation.zh:
杰克，你是在描述
你父亲死去那晚的情形
他们专偷像你这样的小孩

translation.en: The power of your mind, that's what they want.
translation.zh:
你意念的力量
他们就想要那个

translation.en: LON: --control, he's unstable. We need to take the offer.
translation.zh:
控制，他精神不稳定
咱们得接受建议

translation.en: -It's great treatment for no money. LAURIE: It's not about the money.
translation.zh:
-那是很好的治疗，不用花钱
-不是钱的问题

translation.en: -I'll wait in your room. LON: There's nothing more...
translation.zh:
-我去你房间等你
-现在已经没什么

translation.en: -...we can do for him now. LAURIE: Jesus, Lon!
Can you at least pretend like he's your own kid?
translation.zh:
你至少也假装一下
当他是你自己的孩子吧？

translation.en: I'm sorry, baby, we.... We didn't hear you come in.
translation.zh:
对不起，宝贝，我们…
我们没听见你回来了

translation.en: What the hell happened in school today?
You promised me you're gonna stay out of trouble.
translation.zh: 你保证过你不会再惹麻烦的

translation.en: ...the school's been approached by a clinic upstate.
translation.zh: 一个临床医疗机构找了学校

translation.en: Who are having a hard time.
It's supposed to be a great place.
It's science-based: Brain scans, sleep patterns.
translation.zh: 是很科学的：大脑扫描，睡眠模式

translation.en: LAURIE: I think it could-- -Yeah, okay.

translation.zh:
更多心理医生
浪费时间

translation.en: You think I'm crazy too, don't you?
translation.zh: 你也觉得我疯了，是不是？

translation.en: We need help. We both need help.
translation.zh:
我们需要帮助
我们俩都需要帮助

translation.en: LAURIE: I love him so much...
...and I just can't stand to see him like this.
translation.zh: 我受不了看他这样下去

translation.en: He was such a happy kid.
translation.zh: 他原来是个活泼快乐的孩子

translation.en: You have nothing to be afraid of, my friend.
translation.zh: 没什么好怕的，我的朋友

translation.en: You want to know what's on the other side?
translation.zh: 你想知道另一边有什么？

去过了
现在燃烧吧

translation.en: Not while the Tower still stands.
Don't let him get into your head.
BOTH [IN UNISON]: I do not aim with my hand.
-He who aims with his hand-- -Has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.zh:
-用手瞄准的人
-已忘记了他父亲的脸

translation.en: BOTH [IN UNISON]: I aim with my eye.
BOTH [IN UNISON]: I do not shoot with my hand.
He who shoots with his hand has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.zh: 用手射击的人已忘记了他父亲的脸

translation.en: -I shoot with my mind. WALTER: Gunslingers.
BOTH [IN UNISON]: I do not kill with my gun.
He who kills with his gun has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.zh: 用枪杀人的人已忘记了他父亲的脸

translation.en: It never works on you, does it, Roland?
translation.zh: 对你从来都没用，是不是，罗兰？

translation.en: The power you have to resist my magics....
translation.zh: 你那种抵抗我魔力的能力

translation.en: WOMAN: The Man in Black fled across the desert...
-Hey. -This guy, he's some kind of soldier.
And this house, look, it's got a U.S. mailbox.
translation.zh: 而这屋子，看，有个美国邮箱

translation.en: -I think it's in New York. MAN: Timmy, it's 7 a.m.
translation.zh:
-我觉得它在纽约
-缇米，现在是早上七点

translation.en: Sorry, got to go. Talk to you later.
The people from the clinic are here.
I can't.... I can't go now.
You got to step up, Jake.
If you won't do it for yourself, then do it for your mom.
translation.zh: 就算不为了你自己，也为了你妈妈

translation.en: LAURIE: It's in other boys? JILL: It's common in adolescent boys.
translation.zh:
-别的男孩也有？
-青少年男孩身上很常见
我是你的内部行政主管

translation.en: What exactly do they do at your clinic?
translation.zh: 你们的医疗所里到底做些什么？

translation.en: Jake, these guys have been working with the school for a long time.
translation.zh: 杰克，他们和学校合作很久了

translation.en: No, that's okay, Laurie. We encourage questions.
translation.zh:
没关系，劳里
我们鼓励他们提问

translation.en: He's just a healthy growing boy.
translation.zh: 他是个健康成长的男孩

translation.en: I can assure you that all our tests are done in a controlled...
translation.zh:
我向你保证我们所有的测试
都是在可控的…
保护孩子的环境下完成的

translation.en: We have experience with cases like yours.
translation.zh: 我们有处理你这种案例的经验

translation.en: Our approach is actually very gentle compared to standard treatments.
translation.zh:
我们的方法和一般治疗方法比
是非常温和的

translation.en: I understand your concerns, but you don't have to worry at all.
translation.zh:
我懂你的顾虑
但是你完全不用担心

translation.en: Do you want your ripped jeans or your regular ones?
translation.zh:
你是要带你的破洞牛仔裤还是
普通的？

translation.en: -What? -It's the skin people from my dream.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-是我梦里的那些假皮人

translation.en: -Honey, you need to stop this. -No, you have to listen to me.
translation.zh:
-亲爱的，你不能再这样了
-不，你得听我说

translation.en: You actually hope I'm crazy, just so you can get me out of here.
translation.zh:
你就希望我疯了
这样就能把我弄出去了

translation.en: Mom, you have to believe me.
-Lon, maybe this-- -Can't you see he's gotten worse?
translation.zh:
-郎，也许这…
-你看不出来他又恶化了吗？

translation.en: You're gonna go with them right now.
Or, I swear to God, I will drag you down the stairs myself.
translation.zh: 否则，我发誓，我就亲自把你拽下楼去

translation.en: If you don't like it, then I'll come get you.
translation.zh: 你要是不喜欢，我就来接你

translation.en: -I love you, Mom. -I love you too.
I'm just gonna get my toothbrush.
-He's just getting his things. -He's trying to escape.
translation.zh:
-没事，他就是去拿他的东西
-他要逃跑

translation.en: TOBY: Come back here! JILL: Don't worry.
Toby will get him down safely.
translation.zh: 托比会把他安全带下来的

translation.en: -Mom? You okay? LAURIE: Where are you?
You can't just run away like that, Jake.
translation.zh: 你不能就这么跑了，杰克

translation.en: Find yourself a face, Rat Boy.
Fine. Do we have any new leads?
PIMLI: These are all showing promise.
Our trackers are going out to them as we speak.
translation.zh:
我们说话的功夫
我们的追踪者已经出去找他们了

translation.en: TIRANA: There's been a serious breach of--
One of the old portals on Keystone Earth.
translation.zh: 是拱心石地球的一个旧入口

translation.en: Find me a portal close by.
Choose a pretty face and the world is your oyster.
translation.zh:
选个漂亮脸蛋
世界就掌握在你手中了

translation.en: There are no Gunslingers. Not anymore.
translation.zh:
没有枪侠了
不再有了

translation.en: -But I saw you. -Your dreams deceived you, boy.
translation.zh:
-但我看到你了
-你的梦骗了你，孩子

translation.en: Told you what you want to hear.
I came a long way to find you.
ROLAND: Have a nice trip back.
There was a battlefield, and you were fighting the Man in Black. And there--
translation.zh:
是个战场，你在和黑衣人战斗
然后…

translation.en: -No, no, no. I don't know! -Where is he hiding?!
-Where is he hiding?! -I don't know, I swear!
I just-- I just saw him in my dreams, like I saw you!
translation.zh:
我只是…我只是在梦里看到他
就像看到你一样！

translation.en: When did you first see this?
translation.zh: 你第一次看到是什么时候？

translation.en: In all your visions, Walter is here?
translation.zh: 在你的幻象里，沃尔特在这？

translation.en: There's a tribe beyond that forest. We'll go there.
translation.zh:
在树林那一边有个部落
我们去那

translation.en: They have seers who will read your visions.
translation.zh:
他们那有预言家
能解读你的幻象

translation.en: Then I got water up my nose, and I went down...
translation.zh: 结果鼻子进水了，然后我下去…

-然后我就什么也看不到了
-痛恨

translation.en: Walter Padick. To what do we owe this great honor?
translation.zh:
沃尔特·派迪克
您怎么大驾光临了？

translation.en: Someone used a portal here, in your city...
translation.zh:
有人用了这的一个入口
在你的城市里…

translation.en: We'll find out who this trespasser is and where he went.
translation.zh: 我们会找出这个入侵者和他的去向

translation.en: So that's how he got through.

translation.zh: 守屋木妖是很难对付的生物

translation.en: ...but a truly powerful psychic could override it.
translation.zh: 但真正强大的巫师能秒杀他

translation.en: A boy with the Shine strong enough to kill a demon?
translation.zh: 这男孩的灵强到可以杀了恶魔？

translation.en: Sayre, didn't two skins have trouble with a kid yesterday?
translation.zh:
赛尔，昨天不是有两个假皮人
在一个小孩那遇到麻烦了吗？

translation.en: Don't want to have to carry you for the rest of the way.
translation.zh: 我可不想剩下的路都得扛着你

translation.en: Don't run off in the woods. It's not safe.
translation.zh:
别在林子里瞎跑
不安全

translation.en: But you were the one who ran off.
These ancient structures are from before the world moved on.
translation.zh:
这些古老的构造物是
这个世界离开前留下的

translation.en: No one knows what they are.
There was a field covered with bodies.
I lost my father that day.
translation.zh: 那天我失去了我的父亲

translation.en: It's an honor to meet you in person, sir.
translation.zh: 很荣幸能见到您本人，长官
我们有什么能为他做的？

translation.en: Well, I hear you lost a kid.
translation.zh: 我听说你们丢了个孩子

translation.en: It was as if the child knew what we were. We're doing everything we can--
translation.zh:
那个孩子好像知道我们是什么
我们尽了一切努力…

translation.en: Calm down. Enjoy the show, folks.
translation.zh: 冷静点，好好看戏吧，伙计们
你们还没见识过真正的好戏呢

translation.en: You draw with a good hand.
I don't know what this is.
My father showed me a.... A map like this once.
translation.zh:
我父亲有一次给我看了
一幅像这样的地图

translation.en: Inside the circle is your world and my world...
translation.zh: 圈里的是你的世界和我的世界

translation.en: The Dark Tower stands at the center of all things.
translation.zh: 黑暗塔就在所有东西中间

translation.en: And it's stood there from the beginning of time.
translation.zh: 而且是从万物之初就已经在那了

translation.en: And it sends out powerful energy...

translation.zh: 防止我们免受外界的伤害

translation.en: ...full of demons trying to get to us.
translation.zh: 到处都是想来抓我们的恶魔

translation.en: Walter wants to tear down the Tower and let them in.
translation.zh:
沃尔特想要毁掉黑暗塔
好让他们进来

translation.en: When the Tower falls, he'll rule...
translation.zh:
如果塔毁了
他就能控制
一个充满怪物的世界了

translation.en: But you're trying to stop him, aren't you?
translation.zh: 但你在努力阻止他，对吗？

translation.en: I've seen them try to destroy it.
translation.zh: 我看见过他们想要摧毁它

translation.en: -If we could just get there-- -There is no "we," Jake.
translation.zh:
-如果我们能到那…
-没有“我们”，杰克

translation.en: All that matters to me is that I find...
translation.zh:
对我来说唯一重要的事
就是找到

translation.en: They're just like the quakes we get back home.
translation.zh: 跟我们在家感受到的地震一样

translation.en: Yeah, what happens in one world...
translation.zh: 对，在一个世界发生的事

translation.en: Everyone who walks with you dies.
translation.zh: 与你并肩同行的人都会死

translation.en: It's good to see you, man. You got tall.

translation.zh: 不，他们察觉到了你的弱点
制造了幻象来让你分心

translation.en: That was just a small tear.
They happen after every attack on the Tower.
translation.zh: 每次塔遭受袭击后就会出现

translation.en: Those things, they're what's coming if the Tower falls, aren't they?
translation.zh:
那些东西，如果塔毁了
就是那些东西会出现，是吗？

translation.en: But if we find that place where they're keeping the kids, we could--
translation.zh:
但如果我们找到他们放小孩的地方
我们就可以…

但如果我们找到他们放小孩的地方
我们就可以… 怎么了？

translation.en: That was brave, going for the gun.
LON: They're gonna find him, Laurie.
We filled out every form. They have his picture.
translation.zh: 我们表格都填了，他们也有他的照片

translation.en: I hope you don't mind me making myself at home.
translation.zh: 希望你们不介意我自己款待自己了

translation.en: Where I come from, we don't have chicken.
-Who the hell are you? -Oh, you know me, Lon.
You're the one that called me here.
...but with your every desire to get rid of the brat...
translation.zh: 而是用你摆脱那小孩的渴望

translation.en: ...all in the hopes that Mommy there might love you best.
translation.zh: 就是希望这位妈妈能最最爱你

translation.en: But you'll always be a seat-filler, Lon.
translation.zh: 但你永远都只是个占座的，朗

translation.en: -You get out of here right now. -Lon.
It's the man from Jake's drawings.
translation.zh: 这是杰克画里的那个男人

translation.en: Well, it looks like I've got myself a stalker.
This son of yours is quite special, isn't he?

translation.zh: 你现在肯定因为没有相信他的话

translation.en: And you sent your only child off to the asylum.
translation.zh: 还把自己唯一的孩子送到精神病院了

translation.en: May you have twice that number.
I haven't seen one of your kind since I was a young man.
translation.zh:
从我年轻的时候起就没再见过
你们这些人了
你们最强的预言者是谁？

translation.en: The boy here has visions of this place.
translation.zh: 这个男孩看到了这个地方的幻象

translation.en: I need to know where it is.
PIMLI: We managed to do some serious damage, sir...
translation.zh: 我们成功造成了大破坏，长官

translation.en: -...but it didn't fall. WALTER: None of that matters.
translation.zh:
-但它还没倒
-没关系，我找到了他了

translation.en: I found the one. This kid's going to bring down the Tower...
translation.zh:
-但它还没倒
-没关系，我找到了他了 这个孩子仅凭一己之力
就能摧毁那座塔

这个孩子仅凭一己之力
就能摧毁那座塔

translation.en: ...looking for an old friend of mine, Roland of Eld.
translation.zh: 在找我的一个老朋友，埃尔德的罗兰

translation.en: Wait, I thought all the Gunslingers were dead.
translation.zh: 等下，我以为所有枪侠都死了

translation.en: WALTER: Roland's always had an annoying ability...
translation.zh: 罗兰总是有一种非常烦人的能力

translation.en: So I killed everyone he ever cared about.
translation.zh: 所以我就杀了所有他在乎的人

translation.en: Last I heard, he was roaming the Mohaine aimlessly.
translation.zh:
我最近听到的消息是
他在漠因漫无目的地游荡

translation.en: -That's where the boy is going. -Mohaine Desert? Isn't that--?
translation.zh:
-那个男孩要去的就是那
-漠因沙漠？那不是…？

translation.en: Vast. Yes. And so is this boy's Shine.
translation.zh:
辽阔，是的
这个男孩的灵也很辽阔

translation.en: I'll send our trackers in the region, sir.
translation.zh:
我会派出咱们在那个地区的追踪者
长官

translation.en: I don't have anything that can help with that.
You need to rest, let it heal.
You've come all the way from Keystone Earth to find him.
translation.zh: 你大老远从拱心石地球来找他

translation.en: His Shine is beyond anything I've ever seen.
translation.zh: 他的灵比我见过的都要强

translation.en: Very few are born with this gift.
translation.zh: 很少有人天生就有这项天赋

translation.en: Often, the power is so slight, people don't even know they have it.
translation.zh:
很多情况下，这能力很微小
人们都不知道自己有

translation.en: ARRA [THINKING]: Your Shine burns so brightly, Jake.
translation.zh: 你的灵则非常闪亮，杰克

translation.en: You have potential I can't even begin to understand.
translation.zh: 连我都无法知晓你的潜力有多大

translation.en: Her voice was in my head.

translation.zh: 你的天赋是无与伦比的，杰克

translation.en: It made you see across worlds.
translation.zh: 它让你看到了跨世界的东西

translation.en: That's more than six months of travel.
But you can get me there faster than that.
The Man in Black and his men keep track of all portal travel.
translation.zh:
黑衣人和他的手下监视着所有
通过入口的旅行

translation.en: We couldn't help you, even if we wanted to.
translation.zh: 就算我们愿意，也帮不了你

translation.en: The only way to access their territories is from one of their own bases.
translation.zh:
进入他们领地唯一的路
在他们自己的某个基地里

translation.en: Then I'll make it on foot.
...they take kids from different worlds, right?
translation.zh: 他们从不同世界劫持小孩，对吧？

translation.en: They tried to take me from New York.
translation.zh: 他们曾试图从纽约带走我

translation.en: -Doesn't that mean that they--? -They have a base there.
translation.zh:
-那是不是就意味着…？
-他们在那有个基地

translation.en: With a portal that can take me right to this place.
translation.zh:
在那有入口
可以直接送我到这个地方

translation.en: You're gonna send us to Keystone Earth.
translation.zh: 你把我们送到拱心石地球那去

translation.en: CANTAB: We're diverting power to the generators.
translation.zh: 咱们得把能量转移到发动机

translation.en: The portal will be ready shortly.
translation.zh: 入口很快就会准备好了

translation.en: Do they have guns in your world?
And bullets, are they as rare as they are here?
translation.zh: 还有子弹呢，也像在这一样少吗？

translation.en: You're gonna like Earth. A lot.
translation.zh: 你会喜欢地球的，非常喜欢

translation.en: We agreed we'd never use the portal unless the village was in danger.
translation.zh:
我们之前一致同意除非是村庄有危险
否则绝不用入口

translation.en: They will find out we have it and come.
translation.zh:
他们会发现我们有入口
然后他们会过来的

translation.en: We can't disobey a Gunslinger. It's the law.
translation.zh:
我们不能不服从枪侠
这是法律

translation.en: -How do you know what he is? -Arra.

translation.zh: 他是来自吉利厄德的罗兰

translation.en: Last of the line of Eld.
translation.zh: 埃尔德一脉的最后一个人了

translation.en: But the Man in Black has his soul in his pocket...
translation.zh: 但黑衣人掌握着他的灵魂
他的心也已被复仇蚕食

translation.en: Or would you tell us differently?
Only a goat would lie to a seer.
The Gunslingers have sworn an oath to defend the Tower--
translation.zh: 枪侠发誓要保护黑暗塔

translation.en: The war is over, and we lost.
translation.zh:
战争已经结束了
我们输了

translation.en: If you left your little haven, you would see that for yourself.
translation.zh:
如果你离开自己的小避风港
就能亲眼看到

translation.en: ...and trying to fight against it accomplishes nothing.
I was fighting to defend the Tower before most of you were even born.
translation.zh:
从你们大部分人都还没有出生开始
我就在守卫黑暗塔了
那不就是我们输的原因吗？
因为所有人都不再相信了

translation.en: As long as the darkness is out there, the Tower will fall.
translation.zh: 只要还有黑暗，塔就会倒塌

translation.en: And before that happens, I will get my revenge.
translation.zh: 在那发生之前，我要复仇

translation.en: And he doesn't even like me that much.
translation.zh: 尽管他都不怎么喜欢我

translation.en: CANTAB: Should be ready anytime now.
As soon as it aligns, it should open...
translation.zh:
等它一校准
应该就会在你城市的

translation.en: ...in an unobstructed area in your city...
Remember that number. It's your way back here.
translation.zh:
记住那个号码
你才能回来

translation.en: PIMLI: Sir, they're in the village.
-Can you fix it? -We have spare parts in the village.
translation.zh:
-你能修好吗？
-我们在村里有备用零件

translation.en: Jake, go find somewhere close to hide, understand?
translation.zh:
杰克，找个近的地方躲起来
懂吗？

translation.en: -We need to go! Hurry! -Are you okay?
His guns are forged from the steel...
translation.zh: 他的枪由亚瑟·埃尔德之剑的钢

translation.en: ...of the sword of Arthur Eld himself.
I believe Keystoners call it Excalibur.
translation.zh: 拱心石人叫它王者之剑

translation.en: -We have to get out of here. -No, I've got to get them out!
translation.zh:
-快，咱们得离开这
-不，我得救他们出去！

translation.en: No, no, please, we have to go!
WOMAN: They were after our boy.
Why would they want our boy?
translation.zh: 他们为什么要我们的孩子？

translation.en: -Turn on the water pumps. MAN: Right away, sir.
WOMAN: No! MAN 1: Let's try to get them out!
MAN 2: Okay, I'll take care of you! MAN 3: All right.
JAKE: Roland. Please. Help me, please.
translation.zh: 罗兰，求你了，帮我，求你了

translation.en: And as long as he's here, you aren't either.
translation.zh: 而且只要他在这，你们也不安全

translation.en: Be careful using the Shine. They're tracking you.
translation.zh:
小心使用你的灵
他们在追踪你

translation.en: We need to get you help. Right now.
translation.zh: 现在得先帮你治疗一下

translation.en: One last time around the wheel, old friend.
translation.zh: 最后一次围着你转了，老朋友

translation.en: You can't walk into a hospital here carrying guns.
translation.zh: 你不能带着枪走进医院

translation.en: Let me do all the talking.
LAURIE [ON RECORDING]: Hi. You've reached Laurie, Lon and Jake.
translation.zh: 你好，这里是劳里，郎和杰克的家

translation.en: ...and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
RACCOON 1 [ON TV]: This is awful. Try it.
-That looks gross. What is it? -You got to try it. It's terrible.
translation.zh:
-看起来真恶心，是什么？
-你可得试试，糟透了

translation.en: -I don't want to try it if it's terrible. -It's like mango....
translation.zh:
-糟透了的东西我可不想试
-像芒果

translation.en: Do the animals here still speak?
translation.zh: 这里的动物还是会说话吗？

translation.en: Wait, what do you mean by "still"?
translation.zh: 等等，你说“还是”是什么意思？

translation.en: I see the antibiotics are kicking in.
On a scale of one to 10, how bad is your pain?
You were in very bad shape.
I'm surprised you're even sitting up.
translation.zh: 你还能坐起来我都觉得不可思议了
我比大多数人都强壮一些

translation.en: We get that sentiment a lot.
translation.zh: 很多人都自以为是这样

translation.en: So aside from your infection and the wound from the...
...we also found traces of hepatitis A, B, E, and...
translation.zh: 我们还发现了A，B，E型肝炎的迹象

translation.en: Have you traveled overseas in the past couple of months?
translation.zh: 在过去的几个月里你有去过国外吗？

translation.en: No. I've been here on Keystone Earth.
translation.zh: 没有，我一直在拱心石地球这

translation.en: So am I cured or not?
We're going to keep you here for the night to monitor your progress.
translation.zh:
今晚你得留院察看
我们好能时时监测你的进展

translation.en: Maybe tomorrow afternoon-- What are you doing? No.
translation.zh: 也许明天下午…你干嘛？不行

translation.en: -I can't stay here. DOCTOR: You need to get back on that.

translation.zh:
-德斯钦先生，你得…
-感谢你的服务

translation.en: But you need to get back on that.
JAKE: These are painkillers and vitamins.
translation.zh: 这些是止疼片和维生素

translation.en: You only want to take one or two at a...
You have both forgotten the faces of your fathers.
translation.zh: 你们俩都忘了自己父亲的脸了

translation.en: You probably shouldn't talk to people here.
translation.zh: 你可能不该和这的人说话

translation.en: How we gonna find the portal? New York's a pretty big place.
translation.zh: 咱们怎么找入口？纽约这么大

translation.en: I just can't let Walter know how I'm coming for him.
translation.zh: 我不能让沃尔特知道我要怎么找到他
这些止疼片起效挺快啊

translation.en: I haven't felt this good in years.
translation.zh: 我好多年没感觉这么好过了

translation.en: Yeah, we got the good stuff.
ROLAND: Got any more of that sugar?
ARRA: There's nothing to be scared of.

translation.zh:
我向你保证
不管发生什么

translation.en: -You'll be-- WALTER: A seer who lies.
Don't fight it. Where did he take the boy?
translation.zh:
别抵抗了
他把那个男孩带到哪了？

translation.en: You said they were crossing over kids.
translation.zh: 你说他们是穿越的孩子

translation.en: You were one of them, weren't you?
translation.zh: 你就是其中一个，是不是？

translation.en: Which way did they take you through?
translation.zh: 他们从哪带你穿过去的？

translation.en: -No, no, you have to run. -Do you remember? A portal, a door.
translation.zh:
-不，你得快跑
-你还记得吗？一个入口，一扇门

translation.en: It's almost over. It's almost over.
Should have enough to find it. Got to get home and do some research.
translation.zh:
应该有足够信息找到它了
得先回家做点调查

translation.en: -Your home? -Yeah, I got to let my mom know I'm okay.
translation.zh:
-你家？
-对，我得让我妈妈知道我没事

translation.en: SAYRE: We have trackers spread throughout the city.
translation.zh: 整个城市遍布我们的追踪者

translation.en: There's no trace of him yet, sir.
Couple of small spikes, but not enough to hone in on.
translation.zh:
有几个小线索
但不足以跟进

translation.en: I left a surprise for our little friend. Just be ready.
translation.zh:
我给咱们的小朋友留了个惊喜
准备好了

translation.en: -You should probably wait here. TIMMY: Dude.
-Where the hell have you been? JAKE: Timmy. Um....
How's Mom and Lon? They must be freaking out.
translation.zh:
妈妈和朗怎么样了？
他们肯定吓坏了

translation.en: They haven't been home since yesterday.
translation.zh: 他们从昨天起就没回过家了

translation.en: Close your mind. Let the pain run through you, Jake.
translation.zh:
关闭你的意识
让痛苦贯穿，杰克

translation.en: My mom died so you could have your revenge?
translation.zh:
我妈妈的死
就为了你能复仇吗？

translation.en: Maybe your world is almost gone, but mine isn't.
translation.zh:
可能你的世界已经基本上消失了
但我的还没有

translation.en: You said it yourself, as long as the darkness is out there...
translation.zh: 你自己说的，只要有黑暗
在普利茅斯和珍珠路上

translation.en: It calms the heart and the mind.
translation.zh: 它能让我的心和头脑平静

translation.en: I haven't spoken it for years.
I do not aim with my hand.
He who aims with his hand has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.zh: 用手瞄准的人已忘记了他父亲的脸

translation.en: I do not shoot with my hand.
He who shoots with his hand has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.zh: 用手射击的人已忘记了他父亲的脸

translation.en: I do not kill with my gun.
BOTH [IN UNISON] He who kills with his gun has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.zh: 用枪杀人的人已忘记了他父亲的脸

translation.en: STEVEN: Not while the Tower still stands.
-I kill with my heart. -I kill with my heart.
translation.zh:
-我用我的心杀人
-我用我的心杀人

translation.en: Your Shine is your weapon, Jake.
translation.zh: 你的灵是你的武器，杰克

translation.en: Just do what he says. He won't hurt you.
translation.zh:
按他说的做
他不会伤害你的

translation.en: Well, then you're smarter than most.
translation.zh: 那你比大部分人都明智

translation.en: All right, let's get you somewhere safe.
translation.zh: 好了，咱们带你去个安全的地方

translation.en: I see you finally found a compass, yet you still came to me.
translation.zh:
看来你终于找到指南针了
但你还是来找我了

translation.en: Because I'm your only destination, Roland.
translation.zh: 因为我是你唯一的目的地，罗兰

translation.en: It's not me. I'm not doing this.
translation.zh: 不是我，不是我要这么做的

translation.en: First, you want to save the Tower.
Then, kill the Man in Black.
You are like a dog fetching a stick over and over.
translation.zh: 你就像只狗一遍一遍地去捡棍子

translation.en: You tell the kid what happened to the old crew?
translation.zh:
你告诉那孩子
以前的那帮人怎么样了吗？

translation.en: You tell him that everyone that walks with you dies by my hand?
translation.zh:
你告诉他
和你并肩作战的人都死在我手里了吗？

translation.en: Your whimpering excuse for a dad.
translation.zh: 你那呜咽着说着借口的爸爸

translation.en: Stop hiding behind your magic and face me, Walter!
translation.zh:
别再躲在你的魔力背后了
面对我，沃尔特！

translation.en: We both know that no matter who crosses the finish line first...
translation.zh: 我们都知道不管谁先跨过终点线

translation.en: You are the full package, as advertised.
translation.zh:
你真是全能的
如假包换

translation.en: Tall, dark and handsome is about to crash the party.
translation.zh: 高黑帅要来搅和派对了

translation.en: MAN: Let's go, let's go! Move, move!
Alrighty. Let's go put everyone out of their misery, shall we?
translation.zh:
好了，咱们帮大家从痛苦中解脱吧
好不好？
他们要带我去那个地方

translation.en: -It's really gonna happen, isn't it? -Oh, yes, it is.
translation.zh:
-真的要发生了，是不是？
-哦，是的，要发生了

translation.en: Something's wrong here. The levels are plateauing.
translation.zh: 这有点不对劲，水平停滞了

translation.en: Your visions didn't bring you to him, they brought you to me.
translation.zh:
你的幻象没有把你带给他
而是带给我

translation.en: He doesn't love you. He doesn't care for you.
translation.zh:
他不爱你
他不在乎你

translation.en: In fact, he's been using you this entire time to get to me.
translation.zh:
事实上，一直以来他都是在
利用你来找到我

translation.en: This is why you're here. This is your destiny.
translation.zh:
这就是为什么你会在这
这是你的命运

translation.en: Yes, that's it. There we go.
Oh, my God. It's the kid.
It's the kid! He's keeping the portal open!
translation.zh:
是那个孩子
是他在阻止入口关闭！

translation.en: So you wanted me to face you, old friend?
translation.zh: 你想让我面对你，老朋友？

translation.en: It's fitting that you and the Tower should fall together.
translation.zh:
毫无疑问，你和黑暗塔
应该一起被毁灭

translation.en: I do not aim with my hand.
He who aims with his hand has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.zh: 用手瞄准的人已忘记了他父亲的脸

translation.en: JAKE: I do not shoot with my hand.
He who shoots with his hand--
Has forgotten the face of his father.
JAKE: I shoot with my mind.
JAKE: I do not kill with my gun.
He who kills with his gun--
JAKE: Has forgotten the face of his father.
--has forgotten the face of his father.
FATHER: Oh, I'm so glad you're here.
REPORTER 1 [OVER RADIO]: Multiple witnesses saw... ...the strange phenomena in the sky.
translation.zh: 多名目击者看到天空中出现奇怪现象

translation.en: REPORTER 2: Looks like we've seen the worst of it....
translation.zh: 看来我们已经度过了最坏的…

translation.en: REPORTER 3: The weather center has now issued a statement...
...that it may have been some kind of very intense solar flare.
translation.zh:
可能是有非常强烈的太阳耀斑活动
引起的

translation.en: JAKE: Here. ROLAND: What is this?
I have to leave here, Jake.
Why don't you come with me?
Besides, I could use your help.
